title: Frozen by Fear (1U213)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a Nazgul strength +2 (or +3 if the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish that has not resolved).
Lore:	”…he was quaking as if he was bitter cold, but his terror was swallowed up in a sudden temptation to put on the Ring.”
Rarity:	U
